long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Tomcat version 8.0.32 contains bug precluding candlepin from successfully deploying.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 8.0.32-4.fc24
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.Try to deploy Candlepin server.
Actual results: Deploy fails with StringIndexOutOfBoundsException.
Expected results: Deploy succeeds.
Additional info: According to https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58999#c7 this should be resolved in tomcat 8.0.33.
Candlepin is a standard Java application that uses Mozilla Rhino Java scripting engine. Attaching candlepin.war that can be used to reproduce the issue

This looks to be resolved by the 8.0.36 update that I pushed to fix https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1349469. I'll include it in the upcoming update so that you can test it to verify, but it looks OK to me.
